home.title: Freelance Full-Stack Engineer
home.shortDescription:
Certified and passionate software engineer, I am expert in the development of clean and quality applications.
I support you in the realization of your project from its conception to its delivery.
home.longDescription:
Certified and passionate software engineer, I am expert in the development of web applications and websites (high volume sites, intranets, CRMs). I support you in the realization of your project from its conception to its delivery.
Being an entrepreneur since 2017, I had the opportunity to collaborate with a large number of clients including fortune 50 companies (pfizer â€¦) in their digital transformations.
I have a real interest in user ergonomics, optimization and quality of the application in accordance with good practices.
